2015-08-31.abstract: Eni SpA announces discovery of so-called supergiant field of natural gas in Mediterranean Sea off Egyptian coast that could hold potential 30 trillion cubic feet of natural gas; if proven field would be largest ever discovered in Egypt and the Mediterranean.

headline.main: Vast Reserves of Natural Gas Found Off the Coast of Egypt

2015-08-31.lead_paragraph: With the number of shows approaching 400 this year, John Landgraf of FX Networks says the cluttered TV landscape is challenging viewers and the industry.
2015-08-31.abstract: Television executives and producers are increasingly concerned about large number of television shows being produced, making competition for both talent and viewers problematic; trend is being driven by variety of factors, including proliferation of outlets producing scripted television shows, and fact that streaming services also offer older television shows, giving viewers embarrassment of choices.

headline.main: Soul-Searching in TV Land Over the Challenges of a New Golden Age
